hypothesis_content.title: Binance APR Offer Flow Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: Following Binance's 20% APR offer announcement for USD1, a short-term price surge will be followed by a mean reversion within 3-5 trading days as initial hype fades and profit-taking emerges, creating a short opportunity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High APR offers often create temporary buying frenzies that exhaust quickly. The 20% APR is attractive but may not sustain price without fundamental adoption. Retail FOMO typically peaks within 24-48h.
entry_conditions: USD1 rallies >15% within 24h of Binance APR announcement
Volume spike shows declining momentum on subsequent 4h candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial catalyst-driven rally
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price breaks above catalyst high by >3%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: USD1 continues rallying beyond 5 days with sustained volume >150% of 30-day average, indicating genuine adoption rather than speculative pump.
